summary: This mod updates the in-game interaction interface with images representing the Xbox 360 controller buttons.
descriptionHtml:
This mod updates the in-game interaction interface with images representing the Xbox 360 controller buttons. This mod should not interfere with any other mods unless those mods change the default Xbox 360 controller interactions pictures.

This mod does not update the icons for the in-game menu. Due to the way Bethesda designed the menu, the flash and .gfx files have to be modified for it to work. I\'ve been looking into it and plan to make a version with this capability if possible.

Also, this mod automatically activates and deactivates in-game as the engine detects whether or not you have a controller linked. Once the controller is turned off or disconnected, it reverts back to the default keyboard icons.
author: DrNegative
